title: BLAST.tv Austin Major: Aurora vs. G2
description:
Aurora and G2 are scheduled to play each other in round 3 of the BLAST.tv Austin Major Tournament on June 13, 2025, at 12:15 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “Aurora” if Aurora win against G2 in round 3 of the BLAST.tv Austin Major Tournament.

This market will resolve to “G2” if G2 win against Aurora in round 3 of the BLAST.tv Austin Major Tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond June 28, 2025, this market will resolve to 50‑50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the HLTV (https://www.hltv.org/events/7902/blasttv-austin-major-2025)

title: Ethereum Up or Down - June 15, 2 AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the change for ETH/USDT, measured in percentage, is greater than or equal to 0 for the 1 Hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT). The change value displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets

For the purposes of this market, a percentage change of -0.00% qualifies as a "Down" resolution.

This market will resolve to "Up" if the change for ETH/USDT, measured in percentage, is greater than or equal to 0 for the 1 Hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT). The change value displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets

For the purposes of this market, a percentage change of -0.00% qualifies as a "Down" resolution.

For the purposes of this market, a percentage change of -0.00% qualifies as a "Down" resolution.

This market will resolve to "Up" if the change for ETH/USDT, measured in percentage, is greater than or equal to 0 for the 1 Hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT). The change value displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets

For the purposes of this market, a percentage change of -0.00% qualifies as a "Down" resolution.

markets.question: Ethereum Up or Down - June 17, 5 PM ET
markets.description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the change for ETH/USDT, measured in percentage, is greater than or equal to 0 for the 1 Hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT). The change value displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets

For the purposes of this market, a percentage change of -0.00% qualifies as a "Down" resolution.
